sources.source:
\DiagramSquare {
        nw = b.Fc_0,
        ne = b.Gc_0,
        sw = b.Fc_1,
        se = b.Gc_1,
        north = b.\alpha _{c_0},
        south = b.\alpha _{c_1},
        west = b.Ff,
        east = b.Gf,
      }

\DiagramSquare {
        nw = b.\partial _0p,
        ne = b.\partial _0p,
        sw = b.c,
        se = b.c,
        north = 1_{b}.1_{\partial _0 p},
        south = 1_{b}.1_{c},
        east = 1_{b_1}.p,
        west = 1_{b_0}.p,
        width = 2.5cm,
      }

\DiagramSquare {
        nw = b_0.\partial _0p_0,
        ne = b_1.\partial _0p_1,
        sw = b_0.c_0,
        se = b_1.c_1,
        north = i.\alpha ,
        south = i.f,
        east = 1_{b_1}.p_1,
        west = 1_{b_0}.p_0,
        north/style = {exists,->},
      }

\begin {tikzpicture}[diagram]
        \SpliceDiagramSquare <l/>{
          nw = b_0.\partial _0p_0,
          ne = b_1.\partial _0p_1,
          sw = b_0.c_0,
          se = b_1.c_1,
          north = i.\alpha ,
          width = 2.5cm,
          west = 1_{b_0}.p_0,
          east = 1_{b_1}.p_1,
          south = i.f,
          east/node/style = upright desc,
        }
        \SpliceDiagramSquare <r/>{
          glue = west,
          glue target = l/,
          width = 2.5cm,
          ne = b_2.\partial _0 p_2,
          se = b_2.c_2,
          north = j.\beta ,
          east = 1_{b_2}.p_2,
          south = j.g,
        }
      \end {tikzpicture}
